Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
Weston-super-Mare has a catchment population of 7.4 million people within a 2 hour drive time. It also has a strong and diverse industrial base, which has attracted both National and International companies including Lidl, GKN Aerospace Engineering Services and Smurfit Group to the area. Road communications are strong with the A370 dual carriageway linking the town with the M5 motorway at junction 21. With its intercity rail services, proximity to Bristol International Airport and Royal Portbury Dock, Weston-super-Mare provides an integrated business transport network.

Weston Industrial Estate is the premier Industrial estate within Weston super Mare comprising a purpose-built scheme of 74 units with varying size buildings available on approximately a 22 acre site. The estate is situated approximately 2 miles south of the town centre, in the heart of the well-established Winterstoke Road industrial area. Junctions 21 and 22 of the M5 are within approximately 4 and 7 miles respectively and provide easy access to the South West, London, the Midlands and the national motorway network. Weston-super-Mare railway station provides a regular intercity train service to Bristol and London. Bristol International Airport is located 14 miles to the North East.

The estate comprises various unit sizes designed in terraces for easy access and loading. Most units have been subject to a comprehensive refurbishment programme and are of steel portal frame construction, with elevations of brick and block work and profile sheet cladding under an insulated profile sheet roof incorporating 10% roof lights. All the warehouse areas have concrete floors, roller shutter door loading access and three phase electricity supply. All the units have office areas to the front elevations incorporating suspended ceilings with recessed lighting, carpet tiles and w/c facilities. All units have allocated parking and loading areas. The estate is controlled and managed under a single ownership and therefore presents very well creating an excellent working environment.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
LOCATION

Unit 1 is situated within a modern, well configured industrial estate of 15 units, adjacent to Yatton Railway Station. The location provides direct services to Weston-Super-Mare, Bristol, Taunton, Cardiff, and London with good access to A370 linking Bristol to Weston-Super-Mare. Other notable occupiers in Yatton include Smart Architectural Aluminium, Oxford Instruments and Stowell Concrete.

DESCRIPTION

+ Incorporating ground floor office, lobby, WC and kitchenette
+ Steel portal frame construction with brick / block elevations
+ Insulated profile sheet pitched roof, with 10% translucent roof panels
+ 3.12m eaves height, reaching 4.43m at apex
+ Manual roller shutter loading door, 3.37m wide by 2.71m high with separate wicket door
+ Fluorescent strip lighting to the warehouse
+ LED spot lighting to the office
+ Well-presented office with wall mounted HVAC air conditioning
+ 3 car parking spaces
+ EPC D 85
+ We understand mains services are provided including water, drainage and 3 phase electricity

TRAVEL DISTANCES

+ Clevedon  4.60 miles (7.40 km)
+ Weston-Super-Mare  10.80 miles (17.38 km)
+ Bristol City Centre  13.9 miles (22.36 km)
+ Junction 20 of the M5 motorway  4.20 miles (6.75 km)
+ Junction 21 of the M5 motorway  6.20 miles (9.97 km)

UNIT 1_ MARKET INDUSTRIAL ESTATE_ KENN MOOR ROAD_ YATTON - WAREHOUSE
UNIT 1_ MARKET INDUSTRIAL ESTATE_ KENN MOOR ROAD_ YATTON - OFFICE

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Modern End-Terrace Warehouse / Industrial Unit To Let

Dynamic.PrimaryImage.Common.ImageCaption: UNIT 1_ MARKET INDUSTRIAL ESTATE_ KENN MOOR ROAD_ YATTON - MAIN

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
Location

The units are situated within the well-established Hither Green Trading Estate, one of the main trading estates serving the town of Clevedon, situated immediately adjacent to Junction 20 of the M5 motorway. Hither Green connects to Junction 20 of the M5 motorway via Northern Way and the B3133 Ettlingen Way.



Property Description

+ Mid terrace warehouse / industrial units

+ Each incorporating integral two storey office / ancillary accommodation

+ Steel portal frame construction with brick and steel profile sheet cladding

+ 6.27m eaves height, 5.59m minimum clear height

+ Sectional roller shutter loading doors measuring 3.96m wide by 5.2m high

+ 3 phase electricity

+ EPC ratings of C 72 and D 87



Travel Distances

 + Junction 20 of the M5 motorway  0.5 miles (0.8 km)

+ Clevedon town centre  1.5 miles (2.5 km)

+ Nailsea  5.7 miles (9.1 km)

+ Weston-Super-Mare  10.6 miles (17.0 km)

+ Bristol City Centre - 14.7 miles (23.7 km)
